subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Vince Carter scored 16 points, but shot only 5 of 19. Richard Jefferson compensated by making 11 of 21 shots and scoring a game-high 28 points to lead the Nets to victory.
snippet: Vince Carter scored 16 points, but shot only 5 of 19. Richard Jefferson compensated by making 11 of 21 shots and scoring a game-high 28 points to lead the Nets to victory.
